website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix P510 is easy to recommend for its features, photos, and performance, but the usefulness of a 42x zoom lens is debatable.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix P510 is a fun camera to shoot with, overflowing with photo and movie features, and backed by very fast shooting performance and excellent low-ISO photo quality
cons: The P510 has trouble focusing at the telephoto end and its low-light/high-ISO photo quality has room for improvement
Also, the camera feels cheaply constructed

customer_reviews.title: Still a Great Value for a Great Lens and lots of creative space
customer_reviews.text: Th P510's SLR-like build is no joke. This lightweight camera may have a now-outdated sensor but it sports a big, light-grabbing and versatile lens and as many programming options as most DSLRs. For an experienced enthusiast, the P510 gives you as much flexibility as you are likely to need and adds a built-in GPS chip for outdoor shooting. Speaking of which - beware this camera's only flaw, IMO, is that it is not really built for outdoor use. It is very fragile! You will need a solid protective case to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: EOS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Professional and Automatic Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional of photography, but if I buy it because both my daughter and I are dedicated to dances and we constantly appear in theaters and stages from where my family can take pictures with her. The level of Zoom is excellent, it has for video, pre-programmed photography, and many other things. The quality of your image is wonderful. I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Caryled Garcia

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a couple of months now. Greatest pros for me: easy to use and much lighter than any of the other cameras I tried. It also has a good grip. I know, because I've used it single handedly while holding onto my squirming 3 year old or while baking with one hand full of flour, or on the beach while propping myself up on the sand. It takes clear pictures, fun to use the zoom and it captures motion pretty quickly and without much if any blur. I still haven't figured out all of it's abilities, but I'm still playing around. The flash is powerful and helps pictures turn out vibrant not washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: We have another Nikon, which is also an excellent camera, but wanted a point and shoot. A friend met a National Geographic Photographer in Africa who was using this camera and had high praise for it. Following a fair amount of comparison shopping and reasearch, we purchased this camera and could not be more pleased. The P510 has quite a number of features that will handle whatever any photographer may need. The 16 mp and 42x zoom are great. Photographs taken with the camera are some of the best quality I have seen. The clarity and color are unmatched. I hardily recommend this camera for both the novice and more experienced photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Kentana

customer_reviews.title: A great buy when I needed to replace and upgrade from my 5MP camera.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic camera, now that I have accrued over 10,000 photos on this camera and have taken it to a few places around the world I can say this will be the last camera I own. Newer versions have some bells and whistles, but the megapixels are still the same. No need to buy the latest model if you can get this one for a great price. Very nice features once you practice them - good manual, just need to read it like 3 or 4 times and just work on one aspect of photography so you can master it.
customer_reviews.author: mike000mike

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera with room for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera. The photos are crisp, and clear. The auto-focus is quick to respond. I love the superzoom feature, as it gets great detail at a distance. The item could use some minor ruggedization, as I purchased it to replace another that dropped from about a foot onto the ground and was damaged. A stronger metal should be used on the barrel of the housing, maybe? also maybe some rubberization on the body. Still, this was my fault, so I can't fault this great camera for this. If you're buying it just because of the GPS feature, don't. It takes forever to obtain a position, and that rarely works.
customer_reviews.author: Arland M Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because I wanted a camera with a long zoom! The P510 does not disappoint. Even handheld the camera manages to eliminate motion blur at maximum 1000mm equivalent zoom. The image quality is excellent if you are not a "pixel peeper". There is always some noise in digital camera images and when you cram 16 megapixels into a tiny little image sensor the problem just gets worse. But this camera manages noise very effectively and still maintains good image detail. Just two minor complaints: There is no RAW image option and there is no provision to add filters to the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday, he now thinks i am pretty cool. Great, just as clear on 42x zoom as on wide angle. Takes better pics than my canon slr with all the lens and much easier to carry around. Bought it to use at concerts and sporting events where they wouldn't allow the removable lens but now use it for everything as its so good. Great for wildlife also. Only complaint would have been the battery charging system but i knew ahead of time and bought the 2 extra batteries and charger from amazon for $19.95 so always have charged batteries. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Really like this camera The good
customer_reviews.text: Really like this camera The good: •super lightweight, this is my hiking camera. •Has most of the settings of a full size DSLR. •Great zoom lens for a camera this size. •Fun special effects like selective color (you select the color, the camera records that color only, the rest of photo is black and white. some drawbacks: •you can't attach a polarized lens, or lens hood, and the lens cap falls off very easily. You can by "conversion tubes" from third party manufacturers with lenses and a hood, but they are pretty lame and full of problems.
customer_reviews.author: tjwash

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this camera. The zoom is amazing and the pics come out with so much detail. I also love all the different features it has. One of the best decisions I've made was buying this camera. It is my first Nikon! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera from another store about 2 years ago. Recently, our daughter started showing great interest in photography -- so we looked to get her a camera of her own for Christmas. After pouring over specs and reviews...nothing matched the Coolpix P510 for quality, features or price. So we bought hers on Amazon as a refurbished unit. Even more, my brother-in-law was looking for a camera for their family and I recommended this one to them. They love it too! I hope this remains available as a refurbished item for a long time...nothing else on the market has matched it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my husband (he's Joe T!), who had researched this type camera and decided on the Nikon Coolpix P510. He was NOT diappointed! He has taken beautiful photos with it, including long shots and close-ups, landscapes, people and critters and he's still learning about its many functions. He is totally delighted with this camera! Very powerful for the price. Go get one!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tee

customer_reviews.title: Like the camera but you must use the Nikon charger
customer_reviews.text: Good camera but you must use Nikon charger or the camera will not charge correctly. Discovered this the hard way when I went to Africa and was unable to recharge the camera. The charging cable appears to be compatible with standard USB chargers but when I tried to charge it would not charge. Called Nikon and they informed me I had to use their charger. Not that big of a deal but I was trying to reduce the amount of electronics I was taking and another charger is just more stuff Image quality is very good as well as the zoom

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved Nikon cameras and this one looks as good as the pictures it  takes....
customer_reviews.text: As a prior Nikon owner, I always loved them. My last camera wasn't a Nikon and I was never pleased with it. I kept drooling over the camera section and decided it was time. I'm a novice with the P510 so it will be awhile before I'm proficient. So far I have been very satisfied with the photos I've taken and I know I've only scratched the surface. I'm looking forward to learning more and taking movies also. I know that the quality of the camera is top notch and is not at all affected by the color of the camera,,,,but....I love my color!!! To me, it is bright and makes me feel good....
customer_reviews.author: BLB  Hobe Sound

customer_reviews.title: This camera is absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything is new, came inside a white box, all accessories were included. The camera goes beyond my expectations it has an incredible body, perfect grip (better than Canon) and the lens its superb. In general its a point and shooter with some advances features like manual settings but dont expect a dslr. Pictures are great, nice color and balance in general.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Palau Jaimes

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The quality of the pics is amazing as well as the features. Everything from fairly simple to complex. You can use it like a old school manual camera or just let it do all the work. the video quality is really HD too. Good for someone trying to learn photography and then move to more advanced techniques. The zoom is phenomenal. I cant think of a negative thing about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elyk N.

customer_reviews.title: This camera has pretty much replaced my d3200
customer_reviews.text: This camera has pretty much replaced my d3200. I was looking to downsize from a bulky dSLR and get away from having to Cha get lenses. Though definitely not a pro camera, it takes some beautiful pictures and really nice video. Definitely happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: J-Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera for wildlife
customer_reviews.text: The 42X zoom on this camera will blow away the long lenses you used to lug around, at least for magnification. I have taken pictures of subjects in the distance with and without max zoom. In the non-zoomed photo, you see nothing but a hillside, in the zoomed in photo, you see a cowboy herding horses in great detail. Camera does have issues with subject in motion (wants to take multiple photos when using Sport setting) and I have difficulty getting it to focus on small distant objects like the Moon, even on Infinity setting - although I have seen amazing pictures taken of planets with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: ScudAg56

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Basically this camera is just awesome! The zoom is incredible and it takes really clear photos. I really like how the screen puts out so if your taking a picture higher up or down below its much easier. The controls are easy once you get used to them. It has a few filters you can use. The flash is really good. I can light up an entire dark room with it. The one thing I really wish this camera had was auto-zoom. I have to go into manual zoom every time I take a video. Other then that is a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tomp

customer_reviews.title: I love my camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. Takes beautiful pictures and the zoom is terrific! When you zoom all the way out sometimes things look a bit fuzzy.I took a picture of a statue at Versailles that was about 2 football fields away which looked like a speck on the horizon. While the statue was a bit fuzzy I sure could tell what it was with the zoom when I really couldn't tell with the naked eye. I'm sure other cameras might be sharper at that distance but I'm also sure I'm not a paparazzi. For the money this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Karena Stipp

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really GREAT camera. For those wanting to move up from just a point and shoot camera with out spending lots of $$$ this unit is for you. It has a great zoom and excellent optics. It is easy to use and can be used just like a point and shoot or can be set to be used more as a "professional" camera. The lens is not detachable, so don't buy it if you want interchangable lenses. Also has settings to enhance and retouch your photos. Easily interfaces with the computer for photo transfers. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BellaNugosi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful camera! I upgraded from a point and shoot. I was taking a photography course and bought this camera toward the end of the course. I switched to this camera for my last lesson and was able to use it successfully, even though I still hadn't explored all the features. I recommend this camera anyone seeking to upgrade from a point and shoot to a more advanced camera. It can be used with good success in the auto mode, but has many features which allow you to adjust. I am particularly impressed with the 40X zoom.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to use everything correctly on this camera but so far I have been able to take some nice shots indoors & outdoors. I was very impressed with how well the camera actually performs in bad indoor lighting, I took several pics in poor lighting of a running/playing child that were actually usable in the cameras 'manual mode' without even fully knowing what all the settings did and now that I understand a bit more about the camera I know I could of taken even better shots in the same conditions. For a Non-DSLR this camera suits my needs perfectly, I'm happy with it for the 350-400$ price it was when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: BenV.ART

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband. We had a smaller coolpix and were very happy with it. This camera has a huge memory card. My husband takes tons of pictures and dumps anything that he doesn't like. The camera has the normal viewing screen on the back but it also has a viewfinder which is great on sunny days. The zoom is amazing and easy to use. We have taken pictures of things nearly a 1/2 mile away that look like the subject is in our front yard.
customer_reviews.author: HSHCLD

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Camera with a lot of modern features
customer_reviews.text: The camera reminds me of my old Nikon Coolpix 5700 that I love and still own. Same body type and control placement but so much more. The P510 offers both adequate LED display and a convenient color viewfinder. The photos are comparable to my SLR in quality. The shooting speed is slower but the functions for different photo subjects are comparable. I like the P510 because it's a grab and shoot with a lot premium features that cost so much more in a SLR camera but in a convenient package that ready to go. Also, the zoom is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Steve N Better

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Takes AWESOME pics!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on our vacation to Alaska and got great pics and videos of Humpback whales, bald eagles, seals, sea lions, and the gorgeous scenery. Compared to my old Nikon D40, it was really convenient not having to swap out lenses all the time. Saved a TON of hiking with the 42x zoom. Found out the digital zoom only works with the switch on the lens, not the one on the shutter button - but trying to photograph anything at that distance is going to require a tripod or other stabilization equipment (like the railing of a cruise ship). Also doesn't take up as much space as my old D40 and two lenses.
customer_reviews.author: weasel

customer_reviews.title: far from pro photographer
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and brought it to my daughters skating practice. It was bright in there but the action shots I got were fabulous! Love the zoom on it. I took pics of her across the rink and they are clear as can be! I'm waiting to try it out in a little darker environment such as on a stage. While using it tonight, I clicked several times and some came out blurry but I was able to get clear shots while zoomed. I'll update later, after I've had a chance to play with it a little more and learn the settings!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Elj

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We've used the Nikon CoolPix P510 for about a year now, and we don't have anything but praise. It meets our needs perfectly as a highly versatile and technically sound camera. The options for photography seem to be limitless with this camera. A few highly prized features for us are...42X zoom, Sport Mode (5 rapid-fire frames in succession), nice big screen with the optional toggle to the small view finder eye piece, and tons of special photo options.
customer_reviews.author: Garry S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera ever
customer_reviews.text: It's not complicated. It doesn't demand mad photography skills. And yet it takes these amazing pictures that have people asking me, "what kind of camera did you use?" Honestly...I basically just pointed at my subject and snapped the picture. The other day I got a fantastic shot of a red-shouldered hawk that shows every detail of his feathers, his beak, his eyes...and all I did was stand under the tree and zoom in on the bird. I love this camera. Even better, I trust it.
customer_reviews.author: jenpnc

customer_reviews.title: Still evaluating..... could move up ...
customer_reviews.text: Still evaluating..... could move up a star or two. If the camera shows well when diffferent pictures are evaluated, this would be the ideal camera for someone wanting decent sophistication and performance without having to lug along a suitcase of lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the COOLPIX P510 for a few years now with no problems. Great quality for the price. The battery is still working fine. Because of the quality I have since purchased 2 pairs of Nikon binoculars for birding. Nikon has the best prices and superb quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NetGuru

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It has so many different setting options and the moveable screen shots s fantastic. The description said it was used but when I recievrd it everything was still unooened in theoriginal packaging so it was basically brand new. Also the delivery was very quick after I ordered it. Great purchase. Thank you thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Harness - Miss Mia Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: My last Coolpix P510 was so much better. Was this one refurbished
customer_reviews.text: NOT the same as the one I had previously even though the part number is the same. A yr. later it goes on the fritz, frequently changing its setting on its own. The zoom doesn't focus properly either. My last Coolpix P510 was so much better. Was this one refurbished? Sure is tempermental!
customer_reviews.author: hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix p510
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, light-weight camera capable of taking surprisingly sharp and bright long telephoto and macro images. A bonus is it's ability to shoot high definition video with on-camera stereo microphones. It has lots of options for user control of images with as much or as little automation as the photographer would like. Things the camera is lacking are a hot shoe flash or pc jack, a jack for external microphones for video, and a longer-lived battery.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: A friend of mine has this camera and I love the many features
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine has this camera and I love the many features. It is a perfect camera for my daughter and her boyfriend who are just starting out with taking pictures of their vacations but have expressed an interest in more than basic photography. Super excited to give it to them for Christmas! (yes, planning ahead...)
customer_reviews.author: Karla Haigh

customer_reviews.title: nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you are interested in a changeable lens, this camera has every feature that comes with a digital SLR but the lens is fixed. However, the zoom is amazing and all of the other features make this a good buy. The only feature I am not sure how to get around is the flash. The camera will complain that you need to use the flash in most cases when indoors. I am sure it is something I will learn how to circumvent as I read the manual more in depth. I put a high speed 64GB SD card in so I am sure I won't run out of space.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: LCD died before warranty and Nikon will not repair.
customer_reviews.text: I took many a great photo with this camera for a few short months then I started noticing increasing autofocus problems and a lot of blurred images. Suddenly the LCD screen developed horrible vertical lines and blotches of strange colors and was no longer useable at all. To get less than one years use out of a camera of this price is unacceptable and points to Nikons bloated hit and miss product line of the digital age. Nikon customer service is all but non-existent now and they are not honoring the warranty. Due to this and previous Nikon disappointments, I've moved on to other camera brands and will not return to Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark n hoagberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cameras I have owned. I have had some very good camera equipment from 35mm, to DSLR to miniature cameras. This product does video and excellent photos. Really happy with the product and all the available options. I have taken some great pictures with this and only needed one hand to do it. The flip screen that can be adjusted to pretty much any angle is perfect so you can raise the camera well over your head and use the viewscreen to still see what you are shooting. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony and Alyssa G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a casual user of a camera and just like to capture life when it has it moments in higher quality than on a smart phone. This has a ton of settings that can really help you take good pictures. I love the quality of the pictures and the zoom is amazing. If you arnt a serious photographer that needs 10 different types of $1000 lenses then this will do just fine for all of your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to replace my Panasonic FZ 28. I take A LOT of pictures [1000's every year]. I was a little hesitant about buying this camera because of a few of the negative comments I saw in some of the reviews, especially regarding the video and sound. I am really pleased with the photo quality and the video/sound quality. I've been using this camera for a month now and just haven't anything negative to say about it. I absolutely love the 42X zoom! It's a great camera for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nikon p510
customer_reviews.text: This camera is unbelievable. The 42X zoom with the stabalizer is great. Still working through the features and enjoying very good photography. Discovering and experimenting with all this camera can do is nothing but pure fun. The only cons are the battery charging must be done with the battery in the camera. There are inexpensive chargers that can be peuchased seperatly. It's a little larger than I expected, but all is forgiven with all its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Oles

customer_reviews.title: not a professional but easy to figure out
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and resolution. I don't know if because today we are so used with electronics but this one is easy to figure out how to use without reading the manual. Fair list of languague settings which is handy for foreign. Color is nice. Not a professional photographer but I guess this is a cadillac for who is used only to take regular pictures on the cell phone. It doesn't come with memory card, you need to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Stela Pen

customer_reviews.title: travels in Nepal
customer_reviews.text: Have been travelling in the Himalays for 35 years with all my Nikon products...camera, lenses etc and now at the age of 66 I needed a good camera with little weight and no extra lenses. this camera was amazing. Please check out some of my photos at maximal lens distance. It's is hard to focus if you don't have a tri pod, but I did have a mono pod that doubled as a hiking stick. Does not process as fast as most of my other great Nikons but all in all it was great! Cant imagine going back to the bigger cameras at my age and what I do. /Users/info/Pictures/iPhoto Library/Masters/2012/11/09/20121109-074413/DSCN0272.JPG/Users/info/Pictures/iPhoto Library/Previews/2012/11/11/20121111-051150/JSNaXutbTKeKTdMOdLmOlg/DSCN0621.JPG/Users/info/Pictures/iPhoto Library/Masters/2012/11/11/20121111-051150/DSCN0486.JPG
customer_reviews.author: tini

customer_reviews.title: Great Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that I am not a talented photographer. I just wanted a reasonably priced camera that would allow me to photograph my child from a distance during sporting events, at the beach, etc. This camera works great for that. The photos seem very clear and sharp. I am very satisfied with their quality. The video works well enough that I do not carry a separate video camera any longer.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using the Coolpix 510, it has so many capabilities and produces quality photos. I have had many good comments on my photos. I feel having the viewfinder makes getting quality shots much easier, at least for me. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a mid-size camera. I've have always used Canon cameras from SLR's to digital and find this Nikon an easy transition from one brand to another.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I love the 42 x zoom as I use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for years. I love the 42 x zoom as I use it for a lot of wildlife photography. For not being a DSLR, this performs well and the photos are of very good quality. The camera has been fairly durable. It has a lot of modes that are easy to use, which is crucial for me when I only have a split second to get a photo of an animal in nature. Overall, I feel this camera is fairly simply to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Staedtler

customer_reviews.title: Extreme value
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a compact super-zoom camera look no further. Everything is above expectations, speed, friendlyness, focusing speed, etc. With all the features included (I will not re-list them here) it's a no-brainer, however what strikes me most is the quality pictures you can take on dimm light and no flash. That's a cool feature specially when the subjects are beyond the builtin flash's range. I was evaluating the new Nikon 1 but, after careful thought, I decided against it in favor of the P510 due to more versatility, zoom, features, gps and less price. It's a safe buy for anyone looking for a feature packed camera and not willing to spend/carry a pro SLR
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Best snap and shoot for dummies....
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my mother's P510 and fell in love with it... I just had to have one.... Even though this camera is an easy point and shoot, it can be complex too... I LOVE this camera...it takes beautiful pictures and the zoom lens is magnificent!! I recommend this to first timers and people who do not want to buy all those durn lenses!! LOL One day I might get a DSLR but I love this camera for now... You won't regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Is this really a Nikon?
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is great but, the thing goes out of focus constantly. The reviews I read did not mention that fact. This is my second one. I dropped the last one on a concrete floor and broke the zoom. I do home inspections and it is very useful for getting wide angle shots of rooms and, close ups of things like bricks on chimneys. Unfortunately, for no reason that I know of, it stops focusing. I will go back to my office and download the images only to find that a series of pictures are all blurry. I had a Olympus ultra zoom before this and it was much more reliable. The name Nikon is losing it's luster.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, good size, good batt life, great zoom, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the $$ for sure. Some reviews say that the low light performance is not good, but it has done great for us at night outside, even without a tripod. Inside it performs great as well. The zoom is amazing and the image stabilization works well. The battery life has been great so far. The only down side that we have found is extremely minor, and that is that it doesn't have an orientation sensor for rotating the images automaticly. It does have a "orientation sensor" but that turns out to be a "compass" that assits in taking 360 degree panaramas.
customer_reviews.author: Potatopirate

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing! It has an incredible zoom lens, which is what I was looking for. Even though it's a point and shoot camera, it takes professional-looking photos. It has great settings for any condition. I use the "food" and "beach" settings a lot. It does great in low light too. I hardly ever need to use the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother's Day present ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It zooms in close enough with the optical zoom that I can sit in the deer blind and take such clear pictures of the deer that you can see their eyelashes! It's an amazing camera and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Accounting Goddess

customer_reviews.title: SUPER ZOOM...Spy Camera!..lol
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it was a great price... still learning to use it but overall great camera and zoom is amazingly clear...plus no one knows your taking photos of them... HAHA... i'm not a creeper but I took photos of my sis far away and I might as well been a spy .. she had no idea!...Pretty funny!...
customer_reviews.author: SueZ

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P510
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for hiking and all outdoor use in the mountains. Easy to set up, easy to use with very little instruction. Manual is simplified for those that hate to read manuals. Take great photos and most important has a viewfinder. Never leave home without one. Good for entry level photo buffs or even pros, you can do a lot with it, and it's worth every cent I paid.
customer_reviews.author: yarnfly

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: everything works perfectly with this cam! tons of options, VERY close to a DSLR. Zoom is incredible. A couple of glitches though, but I wasnt surprised since I read about them in reviews before. It takes around 20 seconds to focus on full zoom, and the gps does a take a bit to get a location. But thats not a problem for me. Overall its a good camera, I upgraded to this from a Kodak Z981 and its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: mokh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera, amazing zoom, lots of useful features
customer_reviews.text: this thing is da Bomb! Imagine a tree, halfway up a mountain, and we have a picture of an eagle in that tree. You can see his feathers, the pine needles and the pinecones on the tree! Amazing quality images, the 42 Zoom impressed everyone we shared pictures with. We did an 11-day cruise/escursion, and are so thankful we got this before we left! amazing photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Trish
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is just what I was looking for. It takes great pictures. It zooms out for far shots and has settings to cover any lighting situation. It comes with an instructional CD which makes it easy to use. The viewer raises and lowers depending on the angle you want to look at your shot or to view your pictures. I am very pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: PEM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third camera from Nikon and I just LOVE this one! These cameras last me about 5 years and I take a CRAZY amount of pictures..really you would be surprised...these cameras are the perfect cameras to just point and shoot...I do not want to worry about lens changes and all the other stuff and this camera is great for a family on the go! The zoom on this one is AMAZING!! I am still stunned!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Drabek

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with Lots of Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nikon D90 SLR which I love but its too heavy on my long travels and requires an extra lens for any significant zoom photography. So I bought this P510 with 42x zoom lens. I like it so far as I have not used it very much. The only con I have noticed is that the zooming switch zooms the lens too fast. Perhaps I need to practice so that it does not move so rapidly. One big pro is that the menu is very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Anshu Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work camera for those that need GPS documentation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work camera for those that need GPS documentation. You can press the fn button to see if it captured the GPS information right after you have taken the photo. I do insurance inspections and many of the insurance companies are requesting this information. I bought this camera used on Amazon and it is a good, solid camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love the Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a compact camera with long zoom for up close and personal photos in China and SE Asia, without being obnoxious. I was able to take very satisfactory photos from moving vehicles, as well as under a variety of lighting conditions. There are a limited number of f-stops to work with, but a wide range of shutter speeds allows excellent compensation.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about my camera. Love it. I would definitely purchase it again. It's easier to use (understand for a novice like me) than a full SLR and has a great zoom and fast speed to capture the sports and action pics I want even far away. The video camera is a wonderful added bonus =) altho it isn't as great as a regular video camera, it comes in quite handy at times!
customer_reviews.author: Tersa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA ! ! ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: It is such a great camera that 3 of my friends have also purchased one. The only drawback is not being able to self focus. The zoom is wonderful, and MP are enough to allow for cropping. I take a lot of nature photos, both landscape and critters, and I have gotten such wonderful shots!!! I do not use the digital zoom, but the optical zoom produces closer shots than the 300mm lens on the borrowed camera I use. The red body is 'so me'... so glad Nikon came out with it!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Daughters Birthday present - WOW was she thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Our first Nikon Camera...have always been a fan of the Panasonic Lumix line. So far the pictures look great on screen and printed. Haven't yet tested the gps functionality, but don't really care about it one way or the other. Was disappointed that a filters can not be installed on the cameras lens and hence only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RubiconRider

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera overall.......
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a recent vacation. Overall we love the camera. The only reason it only got 4 stars instead of 5 is that the focus on this camera suck in low light. If you take a lot of low light pictures, even with flash, I would recommend looking elsewhere for a camera. Otherwise this camera has a great zoom and crisp photos. Many features you would find on an SLR, like the manual settings, but at a fraction of the cost. Like the size of the camera...smaller than an SLR, but still big enough to feel solid in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out
customer_reviews.text: The camera (refurbished by Nikon, sold by Electronic Deals, fulfilled by Amazon) just arrived and is charging, so no review of performance yet, BUT: whoever puts the parts in the box in this situation (Nikon? Electronic Deals?) put in the lens cover for a different model number, and it doesn't fit. The correct model number is "unavailable, don't know when it will be restocked" on Amazon, though available from other vendors. Amazon has given me "store credit", but of course that's of limited use until/unless they restock.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera. The zoom is amazing. It has a feature to shoot pets, three shoots on one click, and it keeps shooting as long as the pet is looking at the camera. I shot my pet many times. Really, it's a wonderful camera. Samll, powerful and well made. Bought one refurbished, no problem so far, just like a new one.
customer_reviews.author: pedro martin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera little over a year and cannot get over how much I still love it. The pictures have such great quality and the zoom is phenomenal! I broke once but Nikon fixed it since it was covered under warranty. The thing I like about this camera is I can carry it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent photos
customer_reviews.text: Took the camera for a test at a local park. I managed to get great clear pictures. I used it in areas with poor lighting and the pictures came out OK. The zoom is fantastic. The only drawback is the GPS. It took too long to pick the GPS, so I just turned it off and concentrated on taking photos. The video quality is very good just don't focus when taking a video as the lens movement will be heard and I am not talking about the background noise. All in all for an amateur like me it's suits me.
customer_reviews.author: mannu

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera has some features lacking by the P520 and P530 and P600. Mostly I like the articulating/tilting view screen. This is my second one. The zoom on this camera is incredible. I recently took it to Alaska and got some incredible shots of seals, eagles and glaciers. (Sorry no bears.)
customer_reviews.author: Shahin Ariaey-Nejad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera! I was so upset when I broke my original camera and so grateful that someone was selling one! This buy was a pleasure to work with and everything was packaged as if it was brand new THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: For my money, this is the finest camera you can buy in this category and price range
customer_reviews.text: Just back from Burma for a photo shoot with my P510. It performed brilliantly and the pictures prove it. The flip up LED screen is an amazing feature that makes versatile shots more possible. The zoom is amazing and the color is great. It's not a perfect camera. I don't think any camera is. But for the money, this is a better camera than its successor the P520.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great camera... but no SD card, no case, really?
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, I test-drove it on a friend's P510 before buying. Love the many great options & awesome zoom. Except nothing else was included. I've bought cameras before & they always came with case & SD card of some sort. Not this one. Well, I guess the case could be a bit expensive sometimes but a cheap 8GB or less SD card could have been included & avoiding a bit unhappy customer like me. C'mon Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that provides a decent balance of features from a point-and-shoot and DSLR
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for those that want some of the benefits of a DSLR while still having the ease of a point-and-shoot camera. The picture quality is immaculate and you can get as basic or as advanced as you want in your adjustments, short of changing out the lens completely.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes World

customer_reviews.title: Great photos but it takes horrible videos
customer_reviews.text: Great photos but it takes horrible videos. When you zoom during a video it goes out of focus. Don't buy if you want to take videos with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kitcat's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first slr camera and I have to say, though it wasn't my first choice, it surprised me. It has an awesome zoom and it has a lot of dslr functions. It's great for beginners because it's easy to use (in my opinion). You can take great quality pictures and videos with it; however, in low light scenes, it struggles with the focusing. It's smaller than I expected, which I consider a plus; great grip, and the color red gives it more style and stands out! I wouldn't change it for any other camera. I don't regret having choosing Nikon P510 instead of the Sony DSC-HX200V
customer_reviews.author: MelLopez

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX P510
customer_reviews.text: The camera has so far been excellent. The 42X Optical zoom and the shake control enabled me to photograph a flock of Trumpeter swans over 300 meters away. I am still exploring the other features. The automatic white balance has functioned in a number of different situations. This was a problem with a previous camera. I have not yet used the GPS. I downloaded the manual, and I realize it can be printed. However, A fully printed manual in with the camera would have been appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: TedSon39

customer_reviews.title: GREAT camera
customer_reviews.text: I use it for real estate - and family/friends/travel very versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: als.josh

customer_reviews.title: Serving as our organizational camera!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a small non-profit and I purchased this camera for our organization to use to document our events and take photos for publicity purposes (to use on our website, emails and in our newsletter). We have been using this camera for a few months now and by a variety of people and we've been very happy with the quality of photographs that we have taken with the camera. We have also used the camera to take videos that have come out great - much better than I expected. Overall, we've been very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Saporito

customer_reviews.title: Good camera. I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. I am happy with it. However, I should have purchased faster camera; a more advanced model. I bought this model b/c of price decrease at the moment, especially after reading reviews. Again, it does the job, but leaves you with a lot to desire especially when you are trying to catch indoor actions with fast moving grand children.
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: very good camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had the P510 about 2 weeks. I've taken very good hand-held 1000mm zoom shots with no visible blurring. Very impressed with overall quality and value. I've been waiting for more than 1 year for a super-zoom camera with the focal range and features the P510 has. The P510 makes a great backup or even primary camera to my D90. I shoot mostly wildlife, landscape and macro. I recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: JAL001

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: disregard the bad reviews this badboy is simply amazing the zoom is out of this world ...took a license plate of a car from my 17th floor window miles away as clear as daylight .. focus is fine ..as long as you know what you are doing of course..Chose this one instead of the SX40 and couldn't be happier ..every private eye's dream :)
customer_reviews.author: T00nZ

customer_reviews.title: Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Got it for the zoom and it has very sharp focus even at maximum zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phot quality
customer_reviews.text: Seller packaged very well and included all attachments as described. My budding photography enthusiast was so surprised and happy to receive this! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures, incredible zoom, light on the wallet
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you're not going to find a much better camera. The zoom lets you really get up close to something without having to lug an enormous camera lens attachment kit with you.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan1981

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: We used this in Canada on a cruise. So being on a ship you cannot get too close to the land items of interest. We could zoom in and get unbelievable crisp clear pictures with this camera. I expect this to be the last camera I will ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer and I told myself that I was going to buy a DSLR camera and I shopped around for awhile and came across this one in the store and it was expensive so I looked online and Amazon was the cheapest. It works great, when I print them out they come out great and I love the GPS feature because when I upload the pictures it tells me where I took the pictures. The only thing I don't like is the way it switches over to video. There should be another button or be able to hit the shutter button like a usual camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love Nikon cameras and have owned many over the years
customer_reviews.text: I love Nikon cameras and have owned many over the years. This is the perfect point and shoot camera with extended zoom. Love the red color as no one accidentally picks up mine at a gathering. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SonnyB

customer_reviews.title: Loving it as I learn it
customer_reviews.text: I only have point and shoot experience. I got this to use at the kids sporting events. I've used it to capture football and soccer action. The sport mode is great. Good at stopping the action and multiple shots. The zoom is great. I got a cheap tripod for long shots but have since determined that I am better off without it. I have been able to get clear face shots through lineman's face masks from the upper bleachers. Brother in law used it once and is now buying one too. I would buy it again even at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera !!!
customer_reviews.text: I started with Nikon coolpix S6200 and after bought a P510, zoom great, quality at night excellent. At day pictures are wonderful but you have to choose specific options; automatic option i don't like but i suppose it could work well. GPS option gives you the possibility to locate each picture at specific site. Only panoramic pictures I can not adjust adequately ....
customer_reviews.author: JIVG - reviews about purchases

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. I have a D-90 and for a quick shooter, I am seriously considering this as a back up camera. It's well worth the price and if you have a knack for photograpy want to move up to the next level of quick shooter. This will be a great investment as and probably even better then a low budget DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: dalefty75

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: We have two small children who take part in a number of different activities so we were looking for a solid camera with great zooming in capabilities to take pictures that were good enough for framing. This fit the bill to a tee! the camera is extremely easy to operate, extremely light weight and contains utilizes amazing zoom in functionality. The wife really enjoys this and we take it with us wherever we go.
customer_reviews.author: opierod6000

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a really good camera in years, and decided to get this one after my husband raved about his higher end Nikon. I knew I didn't need one like his, and after researching other Nikon's decided on this. I haven't regretted this decision at all! Easy to use, outstanding pictures, + the red is really a neat color.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Zoom more than I can need
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera for 3 years now. and I dropped it several times on hard ground. I once dropped it when I took a picture at the pool into the pool. and it was a disaster I thought it will never work again. But it remained few hours and worked fully functional. This camera is highly durable. Amazing Zoom more than I can need. and I'm hooked on documenting every single event I get immersed into. This cam made a huge difference in my video and photo sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Saleh Nabil

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes sharp photos. Has extensive capabilities for different conditions, but the point and shoot mode works fine for most. I especially like the GPS feature for keep track of scene locations.
customer_reviews.author: deeplaker

customer_reviews.title: A work horse of a camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with chops. I have had this camera for a couple of years now and it's still shooting away. it does a lot of things that hits cousins, the DSL series, don't do. I keep this camera in my car and take it out in my beach bag. It has been a work horse. I have grown quite fond of it.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to a digital SLR.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is terrific!. The best features of a digital SLR are incorperated in it. I like that it has an eyepiece as well as a screen. This helps keep the camera steady when you are zooming way out. It is a bit more complicated than the usual Nikons but nothing too confusing.
customer_reviews.author: jppjr.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon lovers!  This camera is IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was so easy to handle and navigate, that I was taking awesome pics about 5 minutes after taking it out of the box. I am looking forward to traveling with this little gem. When hiking and taking photos, the load has to be light. This camera replaces a huge bag of accessories for the SLR camera. Fun and adventure pretty much sums up this camera! And image quality? Yes, yes, yes!!! This camera will be going with me a lot more often than the SLR nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: 1Sunkat

customer_reviews.title: I think this a great camera if you want to upgrade from your regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this a great camera if you want to upgrade from your regular digital camera but aren't ready for the professional cameras. I haven't really messed with the other settings, but I think it works really great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera even for Novice
customer_reviews.text: Still learning. This is my first camera that moves beyond what I call the "drop-in-your-pocket" basic point-and-shoot camera. So far I love it. I have been able to produce beautiful pictures in the automatic mode. Can't wait to learn about all of the other features of the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Craig

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX P510 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and GPS Record Location (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Style:NewFROM THE MANUFACTURER



For the outdoor photographer, the COOLPIX P510 puts you where you need to be. Bring your subjects up close and personal, with an incredible zoom range of 24-1,000mm. Spontaneous action is captured sharp and clear with optical VR Image Stabilization and amazingly fast autofocus. Every image and Full HD (1080p) movie dazzles when produced by the advanced 16.1 MP CMOS sensor.


YOUR DESTINATION AWAITS
STILLS AND MOVIES UP TO 42X ZOOM
With a 42x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens, an incredible world of optical power and versatility awaits you. Shoot from 24mm wide-angle then zoom to an amazing 1,000mm and capture distant images. In addition, its close-up macro mode is incredible, allowing you to focus as close as 0.4 inches (1cm). The optical Vibration Reduction system minimizes the chance of blur while you take both photos and movies and the side zoom control provides easy access to the P510's powerful zoom capabilities.

EVERY NUANCE DELIVERED
16.1 MEGAPIXEL CMOS PROCESSING POWER
A 16.1 MP CMOS sensor expertly manages high-resolution imagery, delivering exceptional quality in any environment. Even when shooting in low light, your photos and movies will look great. The backside illuminated CMOS technology increases the flow of light to the CMOS sensor's surface, thereby yielding improved quality and minimum image noise.

CAPTURE THE SPONTANEOUS
HIGH-SPEED CONTINUOUS SHOOTING
Don't let a slow performing camera allow you to miss a single moment! Enjoy non-stop shooting with the P510's incredibly fast and responsive performance—up to 5 shots in approximately one second. So whether you're at a sporting event where the action never stops or are simply hoping to capture those fleeting smiles, the P510 delivers all the action with pinpoint accuracy.



WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN?
BUILT-IN GPS AND GEOTAGGING FEATURES
A long way from home? Switch on the built-in GPS feature and as you shoot, your files are geotagged and provide a visual travelogue that pinpoints latitude and longitude. Geotagged photo and movie files integrate with Nikon's my Picturetown® photo sharing site, Google Earth™ and Nikon View NX2™ software. Access all the P510 has to offer on its stunningly vivid, ultra-high-resolution 3-inch LCD monitor.

MAJESTIC MOMENTS IN ACTION
FULL HD (1080P) MOVIES WITH STEREO SOUND
Capture those once in a lifetime moments with vibrant Full HD (1080p) movies. With a single touch of the button, record movies using continuous AF and stereo sound. Choose from special effects such as High Contrast Monochrome or Nostalgic Sepia and add a creative touch to your movies. You can even shoot in slow- or fast-motion for more dramatic action sequences. The P510 connects easily to your HDTV via the HDMI port so you can share the sights and sounds of your adventure.



GRACEFUL IMAGES, MEMORABLE MOMENTS
Put your personality into every photo. The P510 boasts a variety of quick creative options that include Backlight HDR.






GAIN NEW PERSPECTIVES
Use the 3-inch ultra-high-resolution (921,000 dot) Vari-angle LCD monitor to capture the most unconventional angles.

CAMERA DOES THE THINKING FOR YOU
Keep it simple. Let the camera determine the best settings for the job with 20 pre-programmed Scene modes including Sunset mode.






What's in the box: Nikon COOLPIX P510 Digital Camera (Red), EN-EL5 Lithium-Ion Battery (3.7v 1100mAh), Replacement EH-69P AC Adapter Charger, AN-CP21 Strap, UC-E6 USB Cable, EG-CP16 Nikon Audio/Video Cable, LC-CP24 Lens Cap, NikonView NX 2 Software and Limited 1-Year Warranty.



FRAME WIDE PANORAMAS
Easy Panorama mode automatically combines multiple shots into a seamless 180º or 360º panoramic image. Create unique wide views of your scene.
feature_bullets: Full HD (1080p) Movies with Stereo Sound
GPS record location information of your pictures and movies

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars815 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
